headline: Gold Mining Stocks: Winners And Losers At The Start Of 2026
summary: Gold and gold miners have a high hurdle to cross in 2026 after a very strong 2025, but there is reason to be optimistic either have yet to peak. Click to read.

headline: Jim Cramer on Newmont: “You Can’t Really Go Wrong in That Space When Gold Has Had Such a Terrific Year”
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 stocks Jim Cramer commented on. Cramer highlighted the company in light of performance of gold over the last year, as he said: “In seventh place, there’s Newmont, yeah, the gold miner that gained 168% in 2025, reflecting the surge in gold prices last year. […]

headline: ADDITIONS TO SILVER VIPER MINERALS ADVISORY TEAM
summary: Silver Viper Minerals Corp. (TSXV: VIPR) (OTCQB: VIPRF) ("Silver Viper" or the "Company") is pleased to announce the appointment of Mr. Andreas L'Abbé as Financial Advisor and Mr. Gernot Wober as Technical Advisor.

headline: One Of My 2026 Top Picks: Newmont, A Gold And Copper Miner
summary: Newmont leads gold for 2026 with scale, efficiency, 14.1x P/E, 0.30 PEG, strong balance sheet, and a safe dividend. See why NEM stock is a strong buy.
